Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

9  KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::KSGenPositionRectangularComposite() :
10  fOrigin( KThreeVector::sZero ),
11  fXAxis( KThreeVector::sXUnit ),
12  fYAxis( KThreeVector::sYUnit ),
13  fZAxis( KThreeVector::sZUnit )
14  {
15  fCoordinateMap[eX] = 0;
16  fCoordinateMap[eY] = 1;
17  fCoordinateMap[eZ] = 2;
18  }
19  KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::KSGenPositionRectangularComposite( const KSGenPositionRectangularComposite& aCopy ) :
20  KSComponent(),
21  fOrigin( aCopy.fOrigin ),
22  fXAxis( aCopy.fXAxis ),
23  fYAxis( aCopy.fYAxis ),
24  fZAxis( aCopy.fZAxis ),
25  fCoordinateMap( aCopy.fCoordinateMap ),
26  fValues( aCopy.fValues )
27  {
28  }
29  KSGenPositionRectangularComposite* KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::Clone() const
30  {
31  return new KSGenPositionRectangularComposite( *this );
32  }
33  KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::~KSGenPositionRectangularComposite()
34  {
35  }
36 
37  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::Dice( KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries )
38  {
39  bool tXValue = false;
40  bool tYValue = false;
41  bool tZValue = false;
42 
43  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
44  {
45  tXValue = tXValue | ( (*tIt).first == eX );
46  tYValue = tYValue | ( (*tIt).first == eY );
47  tZValue = tZValue | ( (*tIt).first == eZ );
48  }
49 
50  if ( !tXValue | !tYValue | !tZValue )
51  genmsg( eError ) << "x, y or z value undefined in composite position creator <"
52  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
53 
54  KThreeVector tPosition;
55  KThreeVector tRectangularPosition;
56 
57  KSParticle* tParticle;
58  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
59  KSParticleQueue tParticles;
60 
61  vector< double > tFirstValues;
62  vector< double >::iterator tFirstValueIt;
63  vector< double > tSecondValues;
64  vector< double >::iterator tSecondValueIt;
65  vector< double > tThirdValues;
66  vector< double >::iterator tThirdValueIt;
67 
68  fValues.at(0).second->DiceValue( tFirstValues );
69  fValues.at(1).second->DiceValue( tSecondValues );
70  fValues.at(2).second->DiceValue( tThirdValues );
71 
72  for( tFirstValueIt = tFirstValues.begin(); tFirstValueIt != tFirstValues.end(); tFirstValueIt++ )
73  {
74  tRectangularPosition[fCoordinateMap.at(fValues.at(0).first)] = (*tFirstValueIt);
75 
76  for( tSecondValueIt = tSecondValues.begin(); tSecondValueIt != tSecondValues.end(); tSecondValueIt++ )
77  {
78  tRectangularPosition[fCoordinateMap.at(fValues.at(1).first)] = (*tSecondValueIt);
79 
80  for( tThirdValueIt = tThirdValues.begin(); tThirdValueIt != tThirdValues.end(); tThirdValueIt++ )
81  {
82  tRectangularPosition[fCoordinateMap.at(fValues.at(2).first)] = (*tThirdValueIt);
83 
84  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
85  {
86  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
87  tPosition = fOrigin;
88  tPosition += tRectangularPosition[0]*fXAxis;
89  tPosition += tRectangularPosition[1]*fYAxis;
90  tPosition += tRectangularPosition[2]*fZAxis;
91  tParticle->SetPosition( tPosition );
92  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
93  }
94  }
95  }
96  }
97 
98  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
99  {
100  tParticle = *tParticleIt;
101  delete tParticle;
102  }
103 
104  aPrimaries->assign( tParticles.begin(), tParticles.end() );
105 
106  return;
107  }
108 
109  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetXValue( KSGenValue* anXValue )
110  {
111  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
112  {
113  if( (*tIt).first == eX )
114  {
115  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set x value <" << anXValue->GetName()
116  << "> to composite position rectangular creator <"
117  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
118  return;
119  }
120  }
121  fValues.push_back(std::pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*>(eX,anXValue));
122  }
123  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearXValue( KSGenValue* anXValue )
124  {
125  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
126  {
127  if( (*tIt).first == eX )
128  {
129  fValues.erase( tIt );
130  return;
131  }
132  }
133 
134  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear x value <" << anXValue->GetName()
135  << "> from composite position rectangular creator <"
136  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
137  return;
138  }
139 
140  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetYValue( KSGenValue* aYValue )
141  {
142  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
143  {
144  if( (*tIt).first == eY )
145  {
146  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set y value <" << aYValue->GetName()
147  << "> to composite position rectangular creator <"
148  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
149  return;
150  }
151  }
152  fValues.push_back(std::pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*>(eY,aYValue));
153  }
154  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearYValue( KSGenValue* anYValue )
155  {
156  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
157  {
158  if( (*tIt).first == eY )
159  {
160  fValues.erase( tIt );
161  return;
162  }
163  }
164 
165  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear y value <" << anYValue->GetName()
166  << "> from composite position rectangular creator <"
167  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
168  return;
169  }

171  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetZValue( KSGenValue* anZValue )
172  {
173  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
174  {
175  if( (*tIt).first == eZ )
176  {
177  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot set z value <" << anZValue->GetName()
178  << "> to composite position rectangular creator <"
179  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
180  return;
181  }
182  }
183  fValues.push_back(std::pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*>(eZ,anZValue));
184  }
185  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearZValue( KSGenValue* anZValue )
186  {
187  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
188  {
189  if( (*tIt).first == eZ )
190  {
191  fValues.erase( tIt );
192  return;
193  }
194  }
195 
196  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear z value <" << anZValue->GetName()
197  << "> from composite position rectangular creator <"
198  << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
199  return;
200  }

223  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::InitializeComponent()
224  {
225  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
226  {
227  (*tIt).second->Initialize();
228  }
229  return;
230  }
231  void KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::DeinitializeComponent()
232  {
233  for( vector<pair<CoordinateType,KSGenValue*> >::iterator tIt = fValues.begin(); tIt != fValues.end(); tIt++)
234  {
235  (*tIt).second->Deinitialize();
236  }
237  return;
238  }

240  STATICINT sKSGenPositionRectangularCompositeDict =
241  KSDictionary< KSGenPositionRectangularComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetXValue,
242  &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearXValue,
243  "set_x", "clear_x" ) +
244  KSDictionary< KSGenPositionRectangularComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetYValue,
245  &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearYValue,
246  "set_y", "clear_y" ) +
247  KSDictionary< KSGenPositionRectangularComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::SetZValue,
248  &KSGenPositionRectangularComposite::ClearZValue,
249  "set_z", "clear_z" );
